If you played Portal2 without playing this first, make sure to play this. You'll understand all the jokes better, and even though its such a short game its still alive, i mean amazing. Also the object graphics are better in this, giving all the objects more detail, such as the portals, portal shots, and my favorite, the turrets <3

Das Video endet sinngemäß mit "now you are thinking in portals" - Nun denkst du mit Portalen. 'Portal' ist ein völlig abgewandeltes Spiel, welches sich keinem Genre spezifisch zuordnen lässt. Denken und Knoeln gehören zu dem Spiel, verpackt mit einer interessanten Story und einer mehr als amüsanten Spielleiterin!

I know I don't have to recommend Portal.  You know how good it is, and even if you don't, it looks like everyone on Steam got a free copy as a gift.  So why recommend it?  Because the Great Gift Pile wants me to so I can gets me some coal.
